query-mapping.description: List of images used by wiki pages

class.name: AWA.Wikis.Models.Wiki_Image_Bean
class.comment: The information about an image used in a wiki page.

query.name: wiki-image
query.comment: Get the description of an image used in a wiki page.
query.sql: SELECT folder.id, file.id, file.create_date, file.uri, COALESCE(file.storage, 0), file.mime_type, file.file_size, image.width, image.height FROM awa_wiki_space AS wiki INNER JOIN awa_storage_folder AS folder ON folder.workspace_id = wiki.workspace_id INNER JOIN awa_storage AS file ON folder.id = file.folder_id AND file.name = :file_name LEFT JOIN awa_image AS image ON file.id = image.storage_id WHERE wiki.id = :wiki_id AND folder.name = :folder_name
